statements: SELECT * FROM wildlife_protection_areas
SELECT id, area_name, location FROM wildlife_protection_areas
SELECT area_name, location, species_population FROM wildlife_protection_areas
SELECT * FROM wildlife_protection_areas ORDER BY area_name ASC
SELECT * FROM wildlife_protection_areas WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest'
SELECT * FROM wildlife_protection_areas WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT id, area_name, location FROM wildlife_protection_areas WHERE location LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT id, area_name, jsonb_array_elements_text(species_population->'birds') AS bird_species FROM wildlife_protection_areas;
SELECT area_name, count(*) AS total_areas FROM wildlife_protection_areas GROUP BY area_name HAVING count(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM wildlife_protection_areas ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_protection_areas;
SELECT area_name, location FROM wildlife_protection_areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT area_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM population_data GROUP BY area_id;
SELECT DISTINCT species FROM population_data ORDER BY species ASC;
SELECT area_id, year, species, population_count FROM population_data WHERE year >= 2020 ORDER BY area_id, year DESC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_protection_areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT area_name, location FROM wildlife_protection_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT area_id, COUNT(species) AS species_count FROM population_data GROUP BY area_id;
SELECT location, MAX(population_count) AS max_population FROM wildlife_protection_areas JOIN population_data ON wildlife_protection_areas.area_id = population_data.area_id;
SELECT * FROM population_data WHERE year = 2021 AND species = 'Tiger' ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_areas;
SELECT area_name, location FROM wildlife_areas;
SELECT area_name, location FROM wildlife_areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population ORDER BY species, population_size DESC;
SELECT area_name, ranger_name, contact_number FROM wildlife_areas INNER JOIN wildlife_rangers ON wildlife_areas.area_id = wildlife_rangers.area_id;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_areas;
SELECT area_name, location FROM wildlife_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT wildlife_population.species, SUM(wildlife_population.population_size) AS total_population FROM wildlife_population GROUP BY wildlife_population.species;

SELECT wildlife_areas.area_name, wildlife_population.species, wildlife_population.population_size FROM wildlife_areas INNER JOIN wildlife_population ON wildlife_areas.area_id = wildlife_population.area_id;

SELECT wildlife_areas.area_name, wildlife_rangers.ranger_name, wildlife_rangers.contact_number FROM wildlife_areas LEFT JOIN wildlife_rangers ON wildlife_areas.area_id = wildlife_rangers.area_id WHERE wildlife_rangers.ranger_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_protection_areas
SELECT area_name, location FROM wildlife_protection_areas
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM species
SELECT ranger_name, hire_date FROM park_rangers
SELECT area_name, area_size, location FROM wildlife_protection_areas
SELECT * FROM wildlife_protection_areas;
SELECT area_id, area_name, location FROM wildlife_protection_areas WHERE area_size > 1000;
SELECT p.area_id, p.species_id, s.species_name, p.population_count FROM population_data p JOIN species s ON p.species_id = s.species_id;
SELECT pr.area_id, pr.ranger_id, pr.ranger_name, pr.hire_date, wa.area_name FROM park_rangers pr JOIN wildlife_protection_areas wa ON pr.area_id = wa.area_id;
SELECT wa.area_id, wa.area_name, COUNT(p.species_id) AS total_species_count FROM wildlife_protection_areas wa LEFT JOIN population_data p ON wa.area_id = p.area_id GROUP BY wa.area_id, wa.area_name;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_areas;
SELECT area_name, location FROM wildlife_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, endangered FROM animal_species WHERE endangered = TRUE;
SELECT area_id, area_name, location FROM wildlife_areas WHERE location LIKE '%Forest%';
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM animal_species JOIN population_data ON animal_species.species_id = population_data.species_id ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, endangered FROM animal_species WHERE endangered = true;
SELECT area_name, location FROM wildlife_areas ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT conservationist_id, name, specialization FROM conservationists WHERE specialization = 'Marine Biology';
SELECT * FROM population_data WHERE population_size > 1000;
